public interface BinaryEncoder
extends Encoder

Defines common encoding methods for byte array encoders.

byte[] encode(byte[] pArray)
              throws EncoderException
Encodes a byte array and return the encoded data as a byte array.

Parameters:

Returns:

Throws:
